name: Tamashī
description:
At the beginning of the Edo era, in the region of Yama, the Gashadokuro has awoken. Shio, a seventeen-year-old miko, will have to ally herself with a soul from another age and the deity of the Sun in order to carry out her journey that will change her forever.

Tamashī is a 2D top-down adventure game and takes place during Japan's Edo era.

• Move into a 17th century Japanese world
• Assemble different elements of the environment using your needle
• Meet the yōkais from legends of the Land of the Rising Sun

This game was developed by a team of eight 2nd year students : 

• Jean Mayeux : Game Designer, Level Designer, Narrative Designer, Project Manager. 

• Sébastien Lambert : Game Designer, Level Designer, Narrative Designer, Sound Designer.

• Martin Vandevyvere : Game Designer, Level Designer, Sound Designer.

• Nathan Delfosse : Programmer, Game Designer, UX

• Alexis Depienne : Concept Artist, Environment Designer, Narrative Designer, Artistic Director.

• Philémon Caron : VFX Artist, Lighting Artist, Props Designer.

• Raphaëlle Ley : Character Desiger, 2D Animator, Illustrator.

• Dorian Helie : 2D Animator, UX, Sound Designer.
